lead_paragraph: The Tennessee Titans suspended cornerback Adam (Pacman) Jones yesterday for one game as punishment for his long list of off-field incidents. Jones will not play Sunday against Jacksonville. Coach Jeff Fisher said after practice that Jones also would be fined. The loss of one game check would be $49,558, and Jones also faced potential punishment from the N.F.L. for violating its personal conduct policy.
